name: VASIL VERAMEJCHYK
sampleDescriptions: Analysis of U.S. foreign policy relevant to conflict-related detention; Analysis International Law
Efforts to secure the release of a Belarusian national held as a Political Prisoner following extradition from Vietnam; advocacy for his inclusion in prisoner release or exchange negotiations.
